actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that local labor organizations may not be consolidated unless such consolidation has been approved by majority vote of the members of each local organization to be consolidated.

summary.text: Amends the Labor- Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to prohibit consolidation of a local labor organization with another like organization without prior approval of the members.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that local labor organizations may not be consolidated unless such consolidation has been approved by majority vote of the members of each local organization to be consolidated.
